sqlMap.insert: insert into SF_JD_RECORD_FILE_MODEL (MODEL_ID, MAJOR_CODE, ND, CO_CODE, INPUT_DATE, INPUTOR, REMARK, DESCRIPTION, FILE_ID, FILE_TYPE, NAME, IS_ENABLE,FILE_NAME ) values (#modelId:DECIMAL#, #majorCode:VARCHAR#, #nd:DECIMAL#, #coCode:VARCHAR#, #inputDate:DATE#, #inputor:VARCHAR#, #remark:VARCHAR#, #description:VARCHAR#, #fileId:VARCHAR#, #fileType:VARCHAR#, #name:VARCHAR#, #isEnable:VARCHAR#,#fileName# )

sqlMap.select:
SELECT F.NAME AS MENUITEMNAME, F.MODEL_ID,F.FILE_NAME,F.FILE_ID,F.NAME,F.FILE_TYPE,'0' as MAJOR_CODE, F.MODEL_ID FROM SF_JD_RECORD_FILE_MODEL F WHERE F.MAJOR_CODE is null and f.is_enable='enable'
union all
SELECT M.MAJOR_NAME||'-->'||F.NAME AS MENUITEMNAME, F.MODEL_ID,F.FILE_NAME,F.FILE_ID,F.NAME,F.FILE_TYPE,F.MAJOR_CODE, F.MODEL_ID FROM SF_JD_RECORD_FILE_MODEL F,SF_MAJOR M WHERE F.MAJOR_CODE=M.MAJOR_CODE and f.is_enable='enable' and f.major_code is not null ORDER BY MAJOR_CODE
